intro: Helipterum propinquum, commonly known as the slender helipterum, is a flowering plant native to Australia. It belongs to the family Asteraceae, which includes daisies and sunflowers, and is characterized by its composite flower heads. The plant typically grows in sandy or gravelly soils, often in arid or semi-arid regions. It produces small, yellow to orange flowers that bloom in spring and summer. Helipterum propinquum is often found in open habitats such as roadsides, grasslands, and disturbed areas.
